recipe_name: Mahi Mahi with Coconut Rice and Mango Salsa
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons soy sauce, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 clove garlic, crushed, 2 teaspoons red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper ,   +   1/2 teaspoon minced fresh ginger root, 2 tablespoons chopped green onion (Optional),   salt to taste, 4 (4 ounce) mahi mahi fillets, 2 cups uncooked jasmine rice, 2 cups water, 1 cube chicken bouillon, 1 tablespoon butter (Optional),   +   3/4 (14 ounce) can coconut milk, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons butter (Optional), 1   +   1/2 tablespoons white sugar, 1   +   1/2 cups fresh mango, cubed
nutrition: Total Fat 29g 37%, Saturated Fat 18g 91%, Cholesterol 94mg 31%, Sodium 549mg 24%, Total Carbohydrate 107g 39%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 31g, Vitamin C 21mg 106%, Calcium 81mg 6%, Iron 8mg 43%, Potassium 888mg 19%
